replies.body: It also happens to be a 1820 RP tier skin. Who would have seen it coming.
I. Wonder. Who. Would've. Seen. Another. Top. Quality. Ahri. Skin. Coming.
Ahri never had a skin higher than 975 before Arcade.
Isn't Foxfire a 975 skin? I'm also pretty sure Popstar came before Arcade, unless I'm having massive gaps in my memory.

Higher _than_. 

All of Ahri's skins have been 975 or lower before Arcade. Does that sound better?
And? I just want a fucking 975 rp skin for my main, even a 750, anything...

And they will. I assume you're a Sol main judging from your S6 ranked history, and I agree he could use a skin. But that's no excuse for you or anyone else to be a %%%% to someone else for being happy to get the skin.

Aren't you the guy I had an argument with a few months ago because you were whining and crying that SKT might get an Ahri skin? And now you are complaining about people being angry at others that have a new skin. Funny how that goes, isn't it.

I didn't attack anyone who wanted the skin is the difference (Other than SKT/Faker). If someone wanted the skin, good on them, but I'll kms if it happens.

But have you seen the Boards and Reddit? "oh look another ahri skin" "fucking weebs drooling over the body pillows" "weebs are destroying league" "fucking furries" etc. All of those were examples I've seen around from either the Board or Reddit, albeit paraphrased because I don't remember the exact wording. I was just one person, but some of these guys are sheer vitriolic.
_are_.....  ðŸ‘€... you a furry, though?
Nope.
So you're like..... bald??  ðŸ‘€
Also no.

Well 2 things, you did attack me over that, and 2, I haven't seen anything beyond "oh great, yet another Ahri skin while literally 75% of the champ pool gets ignored, good job riot". I have seen nothing attacking the Ahri players themselves, only Riot. So it's just funny how you demanded the ruination of Faker's career by him being drafted into the army, just because you didn't want a skin that you 100% do not have to buy, to be created because it would be connected to him. And then you complain when people don't want your champion to have yet another good skin added to the pile she already has.

I don't want to start a debate over what happened 3 months ago, but the only "attack" I could find was... 

>Go fuck yourself too, if you're gonna treat me like that.

And I only reciprocated after you attacked me. Was it the correct choice? No, it wasn't. And that was the only instance. On top of that, it wasn't even about whether or not you wanted the skin.

If you want to see my entire reasoning, go look at the comment chain between Fondling Gems and myself, and he was the only reasonable person in the thread.

>I haven't seen anything beyond "oh great, yet another Ahri skin while literally 75% of the champ pool gets ignored, good job riot".

I'll list a few examples: [1](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6seu04/pbe_preview_star_guardian_ahri_ezreal_miss/dlc9g5a/) [2](https://www.reddit.com/user/Recktoz) (looks like this guys comments got deleted from the thread but are still on his profile) [3](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6sd0g2/star_guardian_reveal_on_fb/dlbs63w/) [4](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/hAhm6GnW-riot-about-the-new-star-guardian-skins?comment=00070001)

It looks like a lot of the ones I saw earlier were deleted or I can't find them again in this shitstorm. If they were deleted, it was rightfully so.

> And then you complain when people don't want your champion to have yet another good skin added to the pile she already has.

If it were one thread or something, whatever. But there's threads covering a quarter of the front page with hundreds of comments about this. All these comments making me feel like shit just because Ahri got a skin and that "she doesn't deserve another skin" or she's "weeb waifu trash".

But sure, I'll try not to say anything next time because I'm sure everyone's sick of me by now since I could be a fucking defense attorney with how much I post about this shit on the boards.

Well I didn't attack you, I just mentioned that you couuld *not buy the skin* and you got insulted that I could even say such a thing. And again, the posts are directed at *Riot* not you, so stop being a professional victim and claiming everyone hates you for being an Ahri main. Especially after you so vehemently wanted to end somebody's career just because you didn't like the fact that he wins so often and didn't want to be "*forced*" to buy a skin associated with him.

>But sure, I'll try not to say anything next time because I'm sure everyone's sick of me by now since I could be a fucking defense attorney with how much I post about this shit on the boards.

If you think everyone is tired of you for posting so much about the same shit, why do you do it?

The line you said I'm referring to is this one:

>You are such a whiny brat, making a problem where there is none.

---

>And again, the posts are directed at Riot not you, so stop being a professional victim and claiming everyone hates you for being an Ahri main

[Not all of them.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/OpwAQVbY-star-gaurdian-ahri-is-a-legendary-skin?comment=0002)

And [this one too](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/Ylu9EN79-oooh-look-another-ahri-skin?comment=00040003)

---

>If you think everyone is tired of you for posting so much about the same shit, why do you do it?

It was fun, I like debates. I thought maybe I could change someone's mind too. But no, today has made me realize I can't change anything, here at least. And what's the point of posting something that won't change anything? No one cares, so I'm not going to post. All I can contribute is shit about Ahri, and I'm sure I'm "that guy" about it by now. Pretty sure I might've annoyed Malicious Metal the other day about it, too. So yea, I'm sure someone else can say whatever I want to say in the future, but better.

>Yeah, that one definitely singles you out and is highly upvoted by the community.

Doesn't have to.

> You are a permanent whiner, a professional victim that is out to cry and whine whenever you can find a way to make yourself look attacked and try to reap any sympathy you can for it.

No?

>doing the exact same thing here

Similar, but not quite.

>you did when Faker said he wanted Ahri as a skin.

And I'll do it again.

>You should be ashamed of your behavior

I'm not.

---

You see, the thing is, people are going specifically after Ahri in this despite how Ezreal has more skins which one of is an Ultimate. Hecarim who is getting a new skin will have the same amount as Ahri currently does before SG and no one bats an eye. Why?

>Not all of them.

Yeah, that one definitely singles you out and is highly upvoted by the community. The second one is in reply to your bitching, which, I might add, was so heavily downvoted, I had to click the show button to even read what you said. You are a permanent whiner, a professional victim that is out to cry and whine whenever you can find a way to make yourself look attacked and try to reap any sympathy you can for it. You denounce and demonize others for doing the exact same thing here that you did when Faker said he wanted Ahri as a skin. You should be ashamed of your behavior, and its no surprise that people are getting pissed off at you based off what I have seen from you as of late.
Oooh look, another person complaining.
I got chu with the upvote fam
I counter your upvote yah nerd
I counter your upvote with ... ANOTHER UPVOTE! CHECKMATE!
Ha! Jokes on you, Im a potato
With your name im not surprised you said that
Sorry I don't like being vilified, or having my main be vilified for getting a _fucking skin_. I swear you people would torch Riot over it if you could.
If your main hasnt ever got a skin except for the release skin, after so long, you start to want to torch riot 2 :D, You wouldnt know though, since your main always gets "a fucking skin"

Well if you're main has an unreliably small player base that doesn't actively buy skins or has a number of persons equal or greater to the number of potential buyers of a popular champ then what do you expect to happen? You can wish for the death of all ahri mains or whatever but that won't do anything other than rise _your_ salt levels. They still get the skin and if they don't the next skin will just go to another popular champion.

After so many skin lines like youd think theyd give some love for other charcters, its not that bad honestly, they make quiet a lot of money, many dedicated players would like to have a skin for their main to further EXPRESS themselves like riot has been stating they enjoy doing (including new emotes)
Sums up how I felt seeing Kayle get a Pentakill skin.
Kayle got a skin last year alogside Nocturne and Singed.

While the one she got last year isn't exactly high quality, she already has a legendary skin in Arther Wing and several others. It's still a valid example of prioritized resources to one with a fair bit of love while others are still on one or two launch skins.

Whether you like Aether Wing Kayle or not, still a legendary, and limited availability or not, this will be her NINTH skin and an epic skin at that. 
I don't think it should be necessary to bother listing champions still sitting on release skins or others who have gone two years or more without a skin. 
Other champs could have been made a Pentakill skin rather than one with so many.

Calm your tits. 
Cost of skins doesn't matter, and you cant sit crying "OMG Aether Wing was over four years ago!" when she did get a new skin about a year ago while TEN OTHER champs have been waiting 1000 days or more for any skin. 
What you think of the quality of what skins she does have is irrelevant. What is relevant is how many skins she has and that she now has gotten two in 15 months. 

Like it or not, Pentakayle is the same level of favoritism as the rest of the Star Guardian line.
The delusional one can't drop their bias and see Kayle is as favored as Ahri and shouldn't get anymore skins.
Your arguments have been based primarily on if you think a skin looks good or not, ignoring dates, total skins, days without. You are biased and just as stubborn, as well as wrong.

> Your arguments have been based primarily on if you think a skin looks good or not, ignoring dates, total skins, days without.

Nope, I haven't ignored anything, you ignored my answers to that.

So classic:
http://blog.contagiouscompanies.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/08/lalalala-listening.jpg

> You are biased and just as stubborn, as well as wrong.

Oh, how well you described yourself.
Ahri don't deserved another skin, Period.

> [{quoted}](name=One Ashe On,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ylu9EN79,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2017-08-09T03:49:15.345+0000)
>
> Ahri don't deserved another skin, Period.

Neither does Ez, Miss Fortune, Raka or Lee Sin (god fist), yet that didn't stop them

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ylu9EN79,comment-id=000d0001,timestamp=2017-08-09T14:33:18.006+0000)
>
> Neither does Ez, Miss Fortune, Raka or Lee Sin (god fist), yet that didn't stop them

Ezreal , Miss Fortune and Lee i can agree, they already have good epic skin or better . But Soraka have 2 skin that look like barely recolor and the other 2 are 975. She deserved a 1350 skin or even legendary and she fit the most in the sailor moon theme..(Star guardian reference).

> [{quoted}](name=One Ashe On,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ylu9EN79,comment-id=000d00010000,timestamp=2017-08-09T20:26:12.924+0000)
>
> Ezreal , Miss Fortune and Lee i can agree, they already have good epic skin or better . But Soraka have 2 skin that look like barely recolor and the other 2 are 975. She deserved a 1350 skin or even legendary and she fit the most in the sailor moon theme..(Star guardian reference).

If we're going by the "too many skins" argument, she shouldn't have one either

> [{quoted}](name=Viviana,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ylu9EN79,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-08-08T16:22:21.068+0000)
>
> I&#039;m so surprised

So? What's the big deal? It's a good skin and she easily fits into the Magical Girl theme.

Would you prefer them to shove out 520 RP skins again just to shut you guys up?

Ahri just fits into every fucking "theme" they have and it pisses me off.

Mark my words, she's getting a battlecast skin within a year, and they'll make her look the theme too.

But an Ezreal skin is cool

> [{quoted}](name=LiteUpSketchers,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ylu9EN79,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2017-08-09T02:00:04.790+0000)
>
> Ahri just fits into every fucking "theme" they have and it pisses me off.
> 
> Mark my words, she's getting a battlecast skin within a year, and they'll make her look the theme too.
> 
> But an Ezreal skin is cool

I highly doubt she's getting a Battlecast theme. That's just being crazy. I think you need to calm down a bit. Yes, Ahri gets skins...So what? She's a flexible champion that can fit into a lot of universes. What's the issue with that?

I think you're acting really unstable and the entire community needs to take a chill pill. Let people have their skins, Riot has already promised that the left-behinds are going to get caught up.
